title:
Unconditional stability of radially symmetric steady sates of
  compressible viscous fluids with inflow/outflow boundary conditions
abstract:
We show that certain radially symmetric steady states of compressible viscous
fluids in domains with inflow/outflow boundary conditions are unconditionally
stable. This means that any not necessarily radially symmetric solution of the
associated evolutionary problem converges to a single radially symmetric steady
state.
